text: Jerrold Meinwald (January 16, 1927 â€“ April 23, 2018) was an American chemist. He was known for his work on chemical ecology. He worked with Thomas Eisner. He was a Professor Emeritus of Chemistry at Cornell University. He was author or co-author of well over 400 scientific articles. ==References== ==Other websites== * Faculty page at Cornell University Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American chemists Category:Scientists from New York City Category:Cornell University faculty
